Uses of Class
com.github.robtimus.servlet.http.BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode

  • Packages that use BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode 
    Package Description
    com.github.robtimus.servlet.http
    Provides classes and interfaces for working with HTTP servlets.

    • Uses of BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode in com.github.robtimus.servlet.http

      Methods in com.github.robtimus.servlet.http that return BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingRequest.captureMode()
      Returns the capture mode: BYTES if ServletRequest.getInputStream() was used. TEXT if ServletRequest.getReader() was used. NONE if neither method was used.
      BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingResponse.captureMode()
      Returns the capture mode: BYTES if ServletResponse.getOutputStream() was used. TEXT if ServletResponse.getWriter() was used. NONE if neither method was used.
      static BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.valueOf​(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode[] BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
